title: netdraw Men's Ultra Soft Bamboo Viscose T-Shirt Curve Hem Lightweight Cooling Short/Long Sleeve Casual Basic Tee Shirt
description: Super Soft and Comfortable - Buttery soft fabric, light and cooling against the skin, friendly to sensitive skin
Excellent Features - Moisture-wicking, breathable, quick-dry, UPF 50+ excellent sun protection, 4-way stretch, stink-free, keeps you refreshed and clean all day
Looks Great - Curved hem, self collar, basic designed, dense fabric, long-lasting wonderful color and texture, easy to match any outfits
Highly Versatile - Refined basic casual tee, doubles as a good shirt for activities indoor and outdoor, and comfy for sleeping and lounging
Easy to Care - Tag free, machine wash, no special care needed, naturally wrinkle resistant, fits true to size, please refer to the size guide for more information
